text:
Chris Hemsworth’s wife Elsa Pataky has been pictured kissing another man, and the sexy shots are sure to send her hunky husband into a jealous frenzy!

Advertisement

The Spanish sex bomb was seen with her legs wrapped around gorgeous Brazilian actor Marco Pigossi as the couple filmed love scenes for the new upcoming Netflix series Tidelands.

The scene was filmed on a remote beach and actress Elsa – dressed in a figure-hugging frock with a sexy side split – revealed her tanned yoga-honed body, while Marco flaunted his buff gym physique, parading around topless for the day.

It’s the first time Elsa has worked with Marco, but the handsome actor is popular for his appearance on soap drama A Forca Do Querer (Edge Of Desire) and is a heart-throb among many female admirers in his home country.

The pair were seen giggling flirtatiously before locking lips in a passionate embrace.

Advertisement

‘The chemistry was electric,’ said one onlooker.

It’s a rare turn of events for Elsa, as Thor star Chris is often the one busy shooting movie scenes, while his wife stays home looking after their children, India Rose, six, and four-year-old twins, Tristan and Sasha.

‘I am so excited about this project,’ she told Vogue recently.

Advertisement

‘I said no to a lot of offers so I could be with my kids, but I had started thinking that I wanted to get back to work and suddenly this project came up.’

And judging by these pictures, Elsa’s handsome 29-year-old co-star will surely have Chris a little worried about the steamy love scenes.

Elsa and Chris have been together for eight years.

Look away now, Chris! Hemsworth's wife Elsa Pataky, 41, passionately kisses Brazilian actor Marco Pigossi while filming scenes for an upcoming Netflix series in Australia https://t.co/Qk9nhbnien — jupa inocêncio 🌱 (@whoisjupa) June 12, 2018

Advertisement

The couple met in 2010, before Chris propelled to fame, and they became pregnant soon after they married. Elsa admitted, at times his success was hard for her as a lot had changed for them as a couple.

‘It’s difficult when you go from being an unknown person to a very known person and all the changes that come with that,’ she revealed.

The Fast And The Furious actress also spoke to ELLE about how her career changed as soon as she became a mother.

‘It’s interesting how you can be a successful woman who has been working her whole life, and then you have kids and suddenly your career isn’t as important and you don’t appreciate it as much, and you just think: “What am I doing? I have been fighting all my life for this and now I don’t know if I really want it?,”’ she admitted.

Advertisement

Now the roles have reversed, and her career is back in form, how will Chris manage his wife in the spotlight? After years of Elsa sacrificing her own career to support his, she’s finally having the chance to shine.
